text: hi, why is the HubSpot form not fully following 100% width?  esp the submit button?

it also deviates from the container padding. i ask support and their solution is to make the input fields 98% instead but it doesnt work seamlessly well on mobile. anyone has an way to fix this? this is the first time i exp a form looking like this
Could you post to the community forums as well so others can learn from this. Add the link back here as well! Also, I think a link to the page would be helpful
